citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 6:15PM on
17-NOV-16.
The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and was informed that she was out of town.

narrative:
